sqlMap.select: select V.LV_BBS_NO, V.LV_SJ, V.LV_CN, V.LV_START_DT, V.LV_END_DT, V.LV_TIME, V.LV_FLPTH_NO, W.LW_BBS_NO, W.LW_STDNT_NO, W.LW_VIDEO_BBS_NO, W.LW_WATCH_TIME, W.LW_ATTRNDANCE FROM LCTRE_V$table_Nm$ V LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM LCTRE_W$table_Nm$ WHERE LW_STDNT_NO='$lw_Stdnt_No$') W ON(V.LV_BBS_NO = W.LW_VIDEO_BBS_NO) where V.LV_SJ like '%$lv_Sj$%' and V.LV_CN like '%$lv_Cn$%' order by V.LV_BBS_NO desc
select count(*) from LCTRE_V$table_Nm$ where LV_SJ like '%$lv_Sj$%' and LV_CN like '%$lv_Cn$%'
